description:
Supermarket CEO Simulator – Build your retail empire and become the market leader!
Take charge of your own business and turn a small store into a thriving supermarket chain! 

In Supermarket CEO Simulator, you have full control over every aspect of supermarket management – from stocking shelves and hiring staff to marketing and expanding your business. The competition is fierce, and customers have high expectations – do you have what it takes to become a retail mogul?

Key Features:
-Strategy and profit battles – Adjust prices based on supply and demand, offer attractive discounts, and launch promotions to boost sales. Every decision matters – will you go for low prices and high volume, or focus on premium products?
-Hire and manage your team – Recruit staff for every department, from cashiers and shelf stockers to store managers. Offer competitive salaries, motivate your team, and ensure top-notch service to keep customers satisfied.
-Expansion and smart investments – Grow your business into new cities, invest in technology, and enhance the customer experience. Upgrade equipment, optimize sales processes, and build a trusted brand.

Do you have the courage to build a supermarket empire and become the most powerful CEO in the industry? In Supermarket CEO Simulator, success is in your hands!
